item.description:
Join other members for an early evening social at Kitty O'Sheas.
We'll be hanging out downstairs at Kitty O'Sheas from 8-10pm.

Cash bar will be available.

ADMISSION - PLEASE READ:
Admission is FREE with RSVP as long as you RSVP on this Meetup page AND through the Eventbrite link here:
http://moxiebostonyou...

AGE RANGE:
The age range of attendees will vary. The approximate age range of men and women based on past similar events is:
MEN - 25-45
WOMEN - 25-45

IMPORTANT!!!!!!
RSVP is REQUIRED for this event for both men and women. No exceptions.

DRESS CODE
Absolutely NO RIPPED JEANS, NO SNEAKERS, NO ACTIVE WEAR.

THINGS TO KNOW:
*This event is open to all!
*Ethnically diverse crowd of professionals
*We'll be there from 8-10pm


IMPORTANT!!!!!!
RSVP is REQUIRED for this event for both men and women. No exceptions. $10 without RSVP through Eventbrite. Please RSVP here on this Meetup page AND here: http://moxiebostonyou...

DRESS CODE
Absolutely NO JEANS, NO SNEAKERS, NO ACTIVE WEAR.

THINGS TO KNOW:
*This event is open to all!
*Dress code is upscale trendy - Please try to dress to impress - ABSOLUTELY NO JEANS/SNEAKERS
*Ethnically diverse crowd of professionals
*We'll be there from 7-9pm
*Please try to arrive between 7:00 and 7:30pm
*Cocktails will range from $8-$12



CO-SPONSORED BY:
Boston Social Networking
The Boston Social/Professional Networking Meetup Group

group.name: Boston New In Town Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Night Social - Free Event
